Class StudentNotificationDAO

java.lang.Object
ticktocktrack.database.StudentNotificationDAO
public class StudentNotificationDAO extends Object
Data Access Object (DAO) class for handling student notification-related database operations.

    • StudentNotificationDAO

      public StudentNotificationDAO()

  • Method Details

    • sendExcuseAcceptedNotification

      public static void sendExcuseAcceptedNotification(int studentId, String courseName, LocalDate attendanceDate)
      Sends a notification to a student when their excuse letter for an absence is accepted.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The student ID to whom the notification will be sent.
      courseName - The name of the course for which the excuse was accepted.
      attendanceDate - The date of the attendance being excused.

    • getUserProfilePath

      public static String getUserProfilePath(int userId)
      Retrieves the profile path of a user from the database based on the user ID.

      This method queries the `Users` table to fetch the `profile_path` column for the specified user ID. If the user exists and has a profile path stored, the path is returned. Otherwise, it returns null.

      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose profile path is to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the profile path of the user, or null if not found or an error occurs

    • sendAttendanceNotification

      public static void sendAttendanceNotification(int studentId, String attendanceStatus, int enrollmentId, LocalDate attendanceDate, String course)
      Sends an attendance notification to a student about their attendance status for a specific date and course.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The student ID to notify.
      attendanceStatus - The attendance status (e.g., Absent, Present, Excused).
      enrollmentId - The enrollment ID related to the attendance record.
      attendanceDate - The date of the attendance.
      course - The course name.

    • isAlreadyExcused

      private static boolean isAlreadyExcused(int enrollmentId, LocalDate attendanceDate)
      Checks if an attendance record for a given enrollment and date is already marked as excused.
      Parameters:
      enrollmentId - The enrollment ID to check.
      attendanceDate - The date of the attendance record.
      Returns:
      True if the attendance status is "Excused"; false otherwise.

    • getUserIdByStudentId

      public static int getUserIdByStudentId(int studentId)
      Retrieves the user_id associated with a given student_id.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The student ID to resolve.
      Returns:
      The corresponding user_id, or -1 if not found.

    • getSenderFullNameAndRole

      private static String getSenderFullNameAndRole(int userId, String role)
      Retrieves the sender's full name and role as a formatted string.
      Parameters:
      userId - The user ID of the sender.
      role - The role of the sender (e.g., "teacher", "admin", "student").
      Returns:
      A string in the format "Role FullName" or "Role Username".

    • getNotificationsForUser

      public static List<Notification> getNotificationsForUser(int userId, int offset, int limit)
      Retrieves a paginated list of notifications for a specific user, ordered by the date sent in descending order.
      Parameters:
      userId - The user ID for whom notifications are retrieved.
      offset - The number of rows to skip before starting to fetch the notifications.
      limit - The maximum number of notifications to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A list of Notification objects for the user.

    • deleteNotificationById

      public static boolean deleteNotificationById(int notificationId)
      Deletes a notification from the database based on its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      notificationId - The unique identifier of the notification to be deleted.
      Returns:
      true if the notification was successfully deleted, false otherwise.
